title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 59.6 - Accelerated approval procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 59.6 - Accelerated approval procedure

State Regulations
(a) Any certificate, other than those subject to section
59.4
(b) of this Part, will be granted a conditional approval upon the insurer's certification of full compliance with all applicable laws and regulations relative to group insurance policies and certificates of the same type delivered in this State. (b) The certification and the certificate must include a statement that the insurer will retroactively modify such certificate form to the extent necessary, if it is found by the superintendent that the certificate fails to comply in all respects with the applicable law and regulations. (c) Such certification shall include a statement of the expected benefit ratio and, as an attachment, the actuarial memorandum required by section
59.5
of this Part. (d) In the event the superintendent determines, at the time of filing, that the certification is incomplete or the certificate fails to meet the tests as certified above, no conditional approval under this section will be given. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
59.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
